website_summaries.verdict: A classic style that fits small- to medium-sized faces.
pros: Squarish lenses offset a round or oval face shape
Classic look that never goes out of style
Dark lenses protect well from sun but still produce clear vision in most lighting situations
cons: Some found them too narrow, but there’s an XL version that’s wider

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad I paid 15 bucks worth every penny. I didn't like a them a little bit at first but now I think they're okay just a different style than what I'm used to. A little smaller than Oakley holbrook's. very lightweight very comfortable well made I'd buy them again. I'm thinking about putting some gray gradient lenses in them and making them some super bangers. By the way the gray lenses are actually green and this has happened to me before with electric sunglasses they say gray and they're actually green not bad though I like them anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Lenses weren't as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The lenses were not "fire chrome" they were the standard gray, which was very disappointing because that wasn't what was pictured or described. Because the frames looked exactly as pictured i don't think they mistakenly sent me the wrong glasses, i think they just don't have what is pictured, which sucks. My glasses also came slightly messed up. The right side didn't fully open or close because they had a slight bend in them. I've never had any issues with these glasses before, this is my third pair and only because i lost the first 2 over the years, so i think it was just a fluke, but either way it wasn't great.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra K.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy, and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Not many sunglasses fit my big head properly but these were great! They were a recommendation from a friend and I bought a pair that lasted forever even in the harsh conditions of Afghanistan. They are sturdy and the lenses are pretty scratch resistant. They cover enough of your eyes to where people can’t see them but not super dark where everything is extremely hard to see. Long story short someone stole my original pie and ended up buying another pie o my for me to lose them again after a year :( But now on my way to buying a 3rd pair, no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I wear them every day and they seem to hold up great against everyday life! They're very comfortable and the brown tint is great! My ONLY con is I wish the lens were a bit more durable. They scratch fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are awesome. If you are expecting the “tortoise” ones to ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are awesome. If you are expecting the “tortoise” ones to look really really tortoise you may be highly disappointed. Unless you’re in direct sunlight they almost look like a normal pair of black glasses. Myself personally I wanted them to be subtle so it worked out well for me. Also these lenses are fantastic. Although not polarized, they are super clear and take the glare off of things really well and are a lot darker than they look. Definitely a pair of glasses that are plenty worth their price
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Electric Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Soooo These are very good looking glasses. I took away one star because they are pretty difficult to open and close so I do not wear them as much as I thought I would. Nice job overall, Electric. Once again- I put my own lenses in these. I put a mirror finish on mine with brown lenses to I can use them on the golf course. Fits my average head very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: The Boss

customer_reviews.title: Absolute STEAL at $35!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses and at $35 how could you go wrong? Great color and quality visuals thru the amber color lenses. Lightweight and comfortable plus they have a really nice glazed shine too them. For the price theres nothing better. MUST BUY
customer_reviews.author: SJhowe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: * excellent product * good quality * the most important -----> Made in Italy
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Buy These Now!
customer_reviews.text: I've always bought & worn Oakley or Spy brand glasses but decided to give these a try since they were at a decent price point. I'm glad I did, these are BY FAR the most comfortable glasses I've ever worn. They are super comfy, feel great with a hat on (I always wear hats), and give a great "tint" while it's sunny outside. Electric for the win!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - NOT as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These do NOT have green chrome lenses and are NOT the same frames as pictured. Buyer beware. Super cheap plastic and ugly as sin
customer_reviews.author: Ana Kristina

customer_reviews.title: I wanted cool, black sunglasses. Not these goofy hip-hop sunglasses for kids :(
customer_reviews.text: Just awful. Not at all what I was expecting. Matte finish not gloss like the description said, they have this weird 80s flat top design, not like Knoxvilles in the picture and to top it off they have this weird cartoonish design - perfect for a teenage boy who likes hip hop. Except I'm a 35 year old man. Got them, hated them and immediately returned them.
customer_reviews.author: David Utke

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great value for the money . Satified
customer_reviews.text: I love this . It's just a little tight on my face . The frame quality is kind of equal to oakley . And the lenses are pretty dark . No I mean really dark . As for the frame colour it a little darker than what it looks like specially the blue part . One more thing this product is made in Italy and in the box you will receive a sunglasses ,pouch ,sticker ,manual and a cool stencil.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Fit somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: The quality seemed good, great price and I loved the color scheme of the frames, but they were really small on my face and barely reached my ears. All of my Oakley's fit great but the Knoxville almost fit me like kid glasses. I'm 6'1" with average build, apparently I have a big head. Should've tried the Knoxville XL's
customer_reviews.author: J. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my first pair a couple of months ago and was heartbroken. I had them for about 2 1/2 years and they were my favorite pair. My fiancé decided to get me a new pair of glasses for our anniversary and I couldn't find anything that could replace them, but luckily I found them here again even though my color scheme was discontinued! They are legit and the best pair of sunglasses that I've owned and these were only $44 compared to the first time I bought them at $125.
customer_reviews.author: McClapper

customer_reviews.title: Decent glasses for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: The lens scratched the day after I received these, so that sucked! But I like the look of the glasses and they fit my head really well. A little bit heavy is all.
customer_reviews.author: Dan M

customer_reviews.title: Well made, stylish shades
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made in Italy; metal hinges, solid feel. Fit snugly on my average sized male face; would consider the XL if you have a large head. The bigradient fade lenses seem weird but when you wear them you don't really notice it, and it's not apparent from the outside looking in either. These are very similar to the Oakley Holbrooks, which I owned previously, but these seem to be better constructed and higher quality for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S. Gluck

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite sunglasses and I've owned multiple pairs
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sunglasses and I've owned multiple pairs. Unfortunately my new pair easily scratched just when I set them on my car seat. My old ones were able to take a beating better. But they still look cool!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bruehl

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are fantastic: sturdy, good looking and they fit well. They feel more heavy-duty than any of my Ray Ban Wayfarers as well. At a $65.00 price tag, these shades are worth every penny. Give them a whirl.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great Wayfarers
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Look great, quality construction. Like the color (I got clear) Glasses look exactly the same in person as online. Nice size - not too big Cons: None! Great sunglasses. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Do you want to look like a rocker
customer_reviews.text: These are some flashy ass shades. Do you want to look like a rocker? Do you want to impress and influence the crowds? Then don't do too much meth! And grab some of these shades!
customer_reviews.author: story

customer_reviews.title: Electric California, Knoxville
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of Electrics fromt their sight awhile back and i got the exact same pair for way less. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: winnington43

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best sunglasses on the market, perfect fit and acceptable for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my wife and she loves them. They are holding up well over several months use.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ford

customer_reviews.title: WAY better than Oakley frogskins
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair because I was disgusted that Oakley brought back frogskins, wants 3 times the money and did not change the PLASTIC hinge. THESE ELECTRIC KNOXVILLE SUNGLASSES ARE LIGHT, TOUGH, FIT GREAT, METAL HINGE, AND COST LESS, Italian frames and all. Get the Knoxville before any of these:
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and looks of the lens. Always been a fan of Electric sunglasses. Good quality and definitely authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, look great, and were inexpensive. Get a weird color and get a discount on the price.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Really well made shades. I have a small to medium sized face and the fit is fantastic. Slightly snug on the temples so they don't slide around and they have a larger lens than a traditional wayfarer. Love these things!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Myers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shape and construction, this color looks great, would definitively recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: rblz

customer_reviews.title: Electric is the best
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Like a sepia filter for your eyes and I love the reflective lenses
customer_reviews.author: TJ Werner

customer_reviews.title: Little too big for me
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome looking sunglasses but I found them slightly uncomfortable and had to return them because they are too big.
customer_reviews.author: smcall

customer_reviews.title: Great shades!
customer_reviews.text: Although the wrong color lenses were sent I decided to keep them and I can't lie, I love these shades. I feel naked without them!
customer_reviews.author: Queen-O-Sprinklz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing and feel amazing. They are light and provide great UV protection.
customer_reviews.author: netposer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, and unique looks!
customer_reviews.text: Product is pretty cool, the "havana" color swatch is something that you don't see on many brands of glasses these days, and it definitely makes these Electric shades stand out. Great fit, maybe a bit smaller than the Oakley Holbrook.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sunglasses. They are very similar to the Oakley ...
customer_reviews.text: Sweet sunglasses. They are very similar to the Oakley Holbrooks but half the price and well made. Getting great quality and style with these sunglasses. I highly recommend these sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: The Skyscraper

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So good for filtering out the sunlight! Stylish too of course.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Too fly
customer_reviews.text: I love these shades. From the front, they look dark purple. From a 30deg angle or more they are plasma pink color. Solid build, metal henges, no sharp edges left from the mold process.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Glines

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I collect sunglasses, don't really know why but have quite a few. These are quickly becoming my favorite. Arrived quickly and without damage. I ordered the green frame with green lenses, color is close to what the pictures depict. Strong frame with dark, reflective lenses. They fit snug so if you have a larger Mellon, go with the XL. The quality you get for the reasonable price is hard to find now days. I hope they keep this model going cause I'm purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: TaNgYs Reviews

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They weren’t the right ones:/ I received the red instead of brown. Electric should make it right.
customer_reviews.author: James H

customer_reviews.title: Fav shades of all time
customer_reviews.text: Best shades i’ve ever used. So durable and look great..
customer_reviews.author: ThirdEye707

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: i like these product, arrived in the time estimate, very nice, the same in the picture, i like very much
customer_reviews.author: Catena

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone swears they are high end glasses and they are!!! Just without high end price lol
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ford

customer_reviews.title: He looks to good in them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my man.. He looks to good in them!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: cool glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These are rad! A little more purple than we thought they would be. But, cool glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcey crocker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them, they fit really well, shipping was really fast, and the price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cool sunglasses. They are just the same as oakleys or raybans. Why pay more?
customer_reviews.author: lucas bialousow

customer_reviews.title: Love these Knoxville sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these Knoxville sunglasses, this is my second pair... I lost my first pair... I hope Electric doesn't stop making this model....
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Mays

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great condition, color was perfect, and on time delivery...Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Weaver’s

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great look, comparable to the oakley look
customer_reviews.author: Danny DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: Best Sunglasses that I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: Best Sunglasses that I ever bought. It looks better in person than online.They don't feel cheap too! $60 well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bayee

customer_reviews.title: awesome style i love'em
customer_reviews.text: Fits well , awesome style i love'em , good product !!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco J Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but cheap build quality
customer_reviews.text: Look exactly as pictured and the lens quality was good but they fell apart quickly. The arms always moved a little too easily and then one of the arms fell off less than four months after purchase. I'm not exactly wearing these whilst participating in Ironman competitions so them falling apart after standard use is disheartening. I was able to get the arm fixed and now they're fine but these are a little pricey to fall apart that quickly. Great glasses though, love the look and overall quality, it's just the hinges that are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and works good with bright sun. They go well with most of my outfits also
customer_reviews.author: Nick Smith

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved them
customer_reviews.text: Good fit to his face this is the third pair of this style he has had so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ester Vera

customer_reviews.title: THE GREATEST OF ALL TIME
customer_reviews.text: THE best glasses you can buy. I have tried many types of top-end glasses and I keep coming back to these. Can't get over how great they feel and how wonderful they are to wear in the sun. You CANNOT go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: carol s appleton

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace my Rayban Wayfarers that wouldn't stay on my head. The Electrics fit great, stay on my face, are built 10 times better than Wayfarers. I own three pairs of these now and they're my new go-to shades. The polarized version are great for out on the water or while snowboarding. You will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tim D.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Totally works great. Not super durable though. if you want something thick and strong, buy a different tarp. Works well for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Shae Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Such a Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband tried on a pair of Knoxville shades in a surf store and they looked really great on him - we would have purchased them on the spot but, the price was a little high. I found these on Amazon and the price was better than the store by far. My husband loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Barone

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Long time Oakley guy, wanted to try something with a little more style and these fit the bill. Really impressed with the quality of both the lenses and frames.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Yeah buddy!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did I save a bunch of money by switching to Geico, but I got some sick gnar gnar sun glasses. Yeah bro! Killer shades! Now I can couch surf in style.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Helmer

customer_reviews.title: i felt awesome when i see this pic
customer_reviews.text: its different color...a little bit...i felt awesome when i see this pic..but...now so so..
customer_reviews.author: kim jong sun

customer_reviews.title: gnarly
customer_reviews.text: so fly so boss so killer so lord .ladies galore ladies for sure. electric is the future electric is the way.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Elam

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: There are good sunglasses, very nice to have them, good colors and materials, i recomend them for the beach : )
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I didn't look correctly, thought i was getting the HARDknox. My fault. Probably gonna keep these though, they are nice, and cheaper than the hardknox
customer_reviews.author: DF23

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on picture but didn't look nice on me. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: not happy with my order
customer_reviews.text: I am very angry I saw this picture of the glasses of the ones I wanted and I got a totally different pair. I'm really pissed off bc they showed me be a picture of the pair I was supposed to get and ended up getting ones I hate
customer_reviews.author: siobhan

customer_reviews.title: not sure if they're cool or not
customer_reviews.text: They were apparently lost in the mail soooo, not sure if they're cool or not.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F. Lewis-Nebot

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable fit and great style
customer_reviews.text: Very good lenses for sun protection that has great style and fits a smaller face perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K

product_meta.title: Electric Visual Knoxville Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Clean, classic lines and a keyhole bridge define retro-inspired, handcrafted sunglasses with timeless appeal. 10 years ago, we introduced the Knoxville at a time when wrapped sunglasses ruled the market. Today, after having risen to the top of our heap and becoming a staple style that can fit just about everyone, the Knoxville is available in multiple sizes and variations. Whether it be retro cool, or high performance training there is a Knoxville for the job.
feature_bullets: FIT: Large Frame Ideal for round or oval face shapes.
OPTICS: 100% UV Protection. 98% Blue Light Protection from Melanin.
TINT:OHM Bronze (VLT - 11%) Optimal for daily use in bright sunlight
